name: Life Finds a Way (UntitledMind)
description:
Play as a flower trying to survive a massive bee encounter.

HOW TO PLAY

Destroy any moving entity that comes near you with the gun you wield. The bees are evil and must be destroyed. The white clouds mean nothing and are stupid. Shoot the clouds to make them go away. If you shoot a dark cloud, it will drop water. Touch water to get extra points. See how long you can survive!

CONTROLS

Space / Left Mouse Button - Shoot

WHY

A long time ago I thought it would be funny.
